K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:259a-1: a'arya bha ga ba ti pra dzny'a ba ra mi t'a hri da ya /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:259a-3: 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po; bam po gcig go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:259a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:259a-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:259b-0: bcom ldan 'das rgyal @259b bo'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:259b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:259b-2: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das zab mo snang ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:259b-3: yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod par rnam par blta zhing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:259b-4: phung po lnga po de dag la yang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par rnam par blta'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:259b-5: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:259b-7: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo'i spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des ji ltar bslab par bya /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:259b-8: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:259b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:259b-12: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo'i spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des 'di ltar rnam par blta bar bya ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:259b-13: phung po lnga po de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par rnam par rjes su blta'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:260a-2: stong pa nyid las gzugs gzhan ma yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:260a-3: de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:260a-6: rnam par shes pa rnams stong pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:260a-9: chos thams cad stong pa nyid de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:260a-14: dri ma dang bral ba med pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:260a-18: de lta bas na stong pa nyid la gzugs med /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:260a-35: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa nas yid kyi khams med cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:260a-36: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:260a-38: ma rig pa zad pa med pa nas rga shi med cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:260a-39: rga shi zad pa'i bar du yang med do; ;sdug bsngal ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:260a-45: ma thob pa yang med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:260a-48: byang chub sems dpa' rnams thob pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas gnas te sems la sgrib pa med pas 'jigs pa med de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:260b-0: phyin ci log las shin tu 'das nas @260b mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar phyin to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:260b-1: dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:260b-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:260b-6: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sngags /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:260b-7: sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:260b-9: bden par shes par bya ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:260b-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags smras pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:260b-17: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:260b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:260b-19: zhes bya ba byin nas legs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:260b-24: ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la spyad par bya ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:260b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang rjes su yi rang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:260b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:260b-27: byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:261a-0: @261a *// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag lha dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:261a-3: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:261a-4: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:261a-5: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:261a-6: lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen sdes bsgyur cing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:261a-7: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge blo dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-013:261a-8: nam mkha' la sogs pas zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
